title: Form Validation
description: Create a validation function for a login form that checks email and password requirements.
instructions: Create a validation function for a login form that checks email and password requirements.

testCases.expectedOutput: Errors: {email=Invalid email format, password=Password must be at least 8 characters}

hints.text: Use Map<String, String> for field-specific errors
Key is field name, value is error message

commonMistakes.correction: Use ?. for safe calls, ?: for elvis operator

commonMistakes.mistake: Using var when val would suffice
